full_summary:
# Okanagan Chinook Life History Research

## Request for Proposal

* Solicitation Number: 30004719
* Reference Number: cb-9393-68670156
* Amendment Number: 7
* Date of Publication: September 26, 2023

## Project Objective

Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) is seeking a qualified Registered Indigenous Business to conduct research on the life history of Okanagan Chinook Salmon. The purpose of the project is to address knowledge gaps and inform effective management of the Okanagan River Chinook population.

## Research Questions

The contractor will be required to investigate:

* Spatial and temporal habitat use by Chinook Salmon in the Canadian Okanagan Watershed
* Predation on juvenile Chinook Salmon by native and non-native fishes in the Canadian Okanagan Watershed

## Project Deliverables

The contractor must provide:

* Field capacity to conduct and/or support field work in the Okanagan watershed
* Technical and analytical skills to ensure research questions are adequately addressed
* Managerial support to help rebuild the stock and find efficiencies

## Contract Period

The contract period will be from the date of award up to March 31, 2025.

## Notice Requirements

Inquiries regarding this Request for Proposal must be submitted to Jackie Longmire at jackie.longmire@dfo-mpo.gc.ca. Bidders are advised that "BUYANDSELL.GC.CA" is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.

## Tender Closing Date

Tenders must be received by October 16, 2023, at 13:00:00..

## Security Requirements

There are no security requirements associated with this project.

## Trade Agreements

This requirement is not subject to any trade agreements. The project is set aside for Registered Indigenous Businesses.

# Contact Information

Name: Jackie Longmire
Email: jackie.longmire@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
Phone: (506) 471-1717
Address: 301 Bishop Dr, Fredericton, New Brunswick E3C 2M6, Canada

# Notice URL

None
